author: bmwlego
title: McDonald's Happy Meal Plane
review: I am not sure who the character printed on the slope is but the green parts are definitely a plus. When I acquired these sets from a garage sale I didn't have many green parts and most of what I had came from these sets. For the limited selection of pieces included in this set the model looks OK but I don't care for the tail of the plane. I really hope that LEGO and McDonald's partner up again soon to release LEGO (NOT Bionicle) sets in Happy Meals.
